functions.name: writeFile
functions.description: Write a text file with UTF-8 encoding into the user's profile directory (inside a directory named like the id of the add-on).

functions.name: readFile
functions.description: Read a text file with UTF-8 encoding from the user's profile directory (inside a directory named like the id of the add-on).

functions.name: listContents
functions.description: Get contents of a directory in the user's profile directory (inside a directory named like the id of the add-on).

functions.name: stat
functions.description: Get file information about a file in the user's profile directory (inside a directory named like the id of the add-on).
